description:
After accepting Sanosuke`s challenge, Kenshin encourages him to release his anger towards the corrupt Royalist forces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakabatou tai Zanbatou: Tatakai no Hate ni!
Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıç ve Zanbatou Karşı Karşıya / Savaştan Ötesi
The Reversed-Blade Sword vs. The Zanbatou
การประลองฝีมือริมฝั่งน้ำ
逆刃刀対斬馬刀・闘いの果てに!
